section.title: Logging out of a Virtual Machine
section.para: To minimize the risk of data loss log out from a virtual machine before shutting it down. Additionally, if you attempt to forcefully shut down a virtual machine from the User Portal, it might freeze with a status of Powering Down.

step.para: Log out of the guest operating system.
If you were using your virtual machine in full screen mode, press ShiftF11 to exit full screen mode, and close the virtual machine's console window. You are now returned to the User Portal.

To shut down the virtual machine, click the
button. The virtual machine is grayed out and displays as "Machine is Down" when it has been turned off.
